texts.en: Sergio is 48 years old, originally from the Dorado region in the town of Estel. He is married with five dependent children. He has worked as a trade farmer for 40 years growing vegetables. He only studied until 3rd grade, due to his humble origin. Continuing his studies was difficult for his parents so he dedicated himself to working with his father in planting because it was his father who taught him to sow. When he was 15 years old he was already sowing for himself and married when he was 22 years old. After having planted vegetables, from then on he started with tomatoes and onions in his community. The fruits of his labor are buying his own home and having his own team of workers. Currently he is planting half with his father, part of the onion harvest. In addition he earns other means of income doing pig butchering every 5 days in the same community. He is requesting a loan to invest in buying more raw materials and tomato seeds. The loan will allow him to have better earnings, improve his family's quality of life and be a well known producer, allowing him to export to Costa Rica.

loan.use: To buy raw materials and tomato seeds.

loan.name: Livia Blanca Ramona

texts.en:
Ms. Livia Blanca Ramona H. D. R. owns a small bookstore where she sells office supplies and has a photocopy machine. She's been with the Foundation since 2008.
Ms. Livia says that thanks to the credit given, she was able to expand the merchandise of her business, so she could proviD. a better life to her family.
She is very thankful to the Foundation for help provided because it helped her in not only economic matters, but also in self-esteem and skill development.

loan.use: buying office supplies (paper, pens, rulers, etc)

loan.name: Luis Alonso

texts.es: Don Luis de 31 aos de edad, se dedica a sembrar granos bsicos y elaborar dulce de panela, reside en Corinto departamento de Morazn, donde vive con su familia, su esposa Rosa y cuatro hijos Carlos de 16 aos, Jos de 14, Ren de 13 y Luis de 10 aos de edad. El trabajo de Luis es la agricultura realizndola todos los das ya sean realizando labores con el cultivo de maz, frijol, maicillo y en la temporada de trapiche de donde obtiene el dulce de panela, este oficio fue herencia de sus padres. El necesita invertir en la actividad de la molienda, por lo que solicita un prstamo para llevar a cabo todo el proceso, ya que esta temporada necesita pagar mano de obra pues l solo no puede realizar el trabajo de la molienda. Suea con seguir en su trabajo pues es algo que le agrada realizar, pero espera que los frutos de este trabajo se reflejen en sus hijos, avanzando en sus estudios y siendo profesionales en un futuro.
texts.en:
Luis, 31, plants basic grains and makes dulce de panela (sweet made from sugar cane). He lives in Corinto, Morazn department, with his family, his wife, Rosa, and four children: Carlos, 16, Jos, 14, Ren, 13 and Luis, 10.
Luis works in agriculture daily in chores related to corn, beans and sorghum and during the sugar cane grinding season he obtains the dulce de panela; this line of work was passed down to him by his parents.
He needs to invest in the sugar cane grinding activity. He asked for a loan to accomplish the entire process because during this season he has to pay labor costs because he cant manage the grinding by himself.
He dreams with staying in business because its something he enjoys but he hopes that the fruits of his labors will be reflected in his children as they advance in their studies becoming professionals in the future.

loan.use: To pay labor costs for the process of sugar cane grinding.

loan.name: Lilian Del Carmen

texts.es: Doa Lilian, de 40 aos de edad, reside en Lolotique departamento de San Miguel, vive con su esposo y cuatro hijos de 20, 18, 14 y 3 aos de edad, los cuales dependen econmicamente. Doa Lilian administra una tienda hace 12 aos, por iniciativa propia, trabajando de lunes a domingo, no tiene un horario de venta pues la tiene en su propia casa, Ella est solicitando un prstamo para invertir en este negocio, comprando: Maz, arroz, frijol, azcar, aceite, sopas, verduras, pollo, bebidas entre otros que a diario vende a sus clientes. Este prstamo le ayudara a fortalecer el negocio ya que lograra abastecerlo de todo lo necesario en el hogar, ya que son los ms demandados por los clientes. Sus aspiraciones es continuar aumentando el negocio, que sus hijos terminen sus estudios para que opten por un futuro ms estable.
texts.en:
Doa Lilian is 40 years old and resides in Lolotique in the Department of San Miguel. She lives with her husband and their four children (ages 20, 18, 14, and 3) who are financial dependents.

Doa Lilian has managed a store for twelve years through her own initiative. She works Monday through Sunday, but she does not have a set schedule since she sells out of her home. Lilian is requesting a loan to invest in her business. She will buy corn, rice, sugar, oil, soups, vegetables, chicken, beverages and other items she sells every day to her customers.

This loan will help strengthen her business by allowing her to remain stocked with all types of household necessities that are most requested by her customers. Her aspirations include continuing to increase her business so that her children can finish their studies. She believes this will give them the chance to have a more stable future.

loan.use: Purchase merchandise for her store

loan.name: Luis Carlos

texts.es: Luis Carlos tiene 23 aos.es una persona muy responsable pues ha sido un buen cliente. La actividad econmica de Luis es la venta de pollo. El dio inicio hace ms de 3 aos, pues era su nico medio de ingreso ya que tena que proporcionarle el pan de cada da. Y Logro salir adelante, Luis es un hombre muy luchador y que le gusta el trabajo duro. Por lo que el financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de pechuga, piernas, muslos entre otras partes del pollo. Suea con proporcionarle mejoras a su vivienda.
texts.en:
23-year old Luis Carlos is a very responsible person who has been a good client [of our institution]. He makes his living by selling chickens. He started this work more than three years ago--it was his only income and he had to do something to support himself each day. He managed to make a success of his venture; Luis is a fighter and he likes to work hard.
The loan he is now seeking is to buy chicken breasts, legs, and thighs etc. His dream is to make improvements to his house.

loan.use: to buy more chicken pieces

loan.name: Hugo Enrique

texts.es: Hugo de 26 aos de edad, reside en Corinto departamento de Morazn, se dedica a criar cerdos y posee una tienda, l vive con su esposa Luisa y tienen una hija de 3 aos de edad. El negocio tiene 4 aos de existir, lo atiende de 7:00am a 8:00pm, la crianza de cerdos es un oficio que aprendi junto a sus padres. El est solicitando un prstamo para surtir la tienda y tambin quiere comprar cerditos, este prstamo ser una gran ayuda para mejorar el negocio y adquirir ms cerdos para crecerlos, espera ir superando las dificultades econmicas y que su situacin sea mejor cada da. Los objetivos de Hugo es seguir invirtiendo en el negocio, ya que de l depende su familia para los cuales desea darles lo mejor.
texts.en:
Hugo is 26 years old and resides in Corinto in the Department of Morazn. He raises pigs and manages a store. Hugo lives with his wife Luisa and their three year old daughter. His business has been in existence for four years and he manages it from 7am to 8pm. Raising pigs is a trade he learned from his parents.

Hugo is requesting a loan to restock his store, but he also wants to buy piglets. This loan will be a great help in improving his business and acquiring more pigs to raise. He hopes to overcome his financial difficulties and improve his situation each day. One of his goals is to continue investing in his business since he relies on it so that he can provide his family the best.

loan.use: Purchase merchandise for his store & acquire piglets

loan.name: Irina

texts.en:
Irina is divorced with two children. She sells women's clothing at the Ivano-Frankivsk open market. Irina has been in this business for 15 years. She has two business locations and one employee. This business is the only source of income for Irina and her children.

Irina would like to borrow 10,000 UAH to increase the variety of clothing she stocks. She hopes to increase sales and make additional income. Irina's goal is to save enough money to help her children enroll in college.

loan.use: To increase her variety of stock.

loan.name: Ismael

texts.es: Ismael hombre trabajador, casado su esposa de profesin docente, agricultor planes mejora poco a poco su nivel de vida y mejor su finca. Se le presenta dificultades como son el alza de los precios de los insumos. El prstamo que solicitad ser invertido en la compra de Compra de semillas, alambre, postes, fertilizantes y exfoliantes. Agradece a la financiera por el apoyo al desarrollo de su finca.
texts.en:
Ismael is married and a hardworking gentleman. His wife is a teacher by profession. Ismael is a farmer who has plans to gradually improve his standard of living as well as his farm. Among the difficulties he faces are price increases of his supplies.
The loan he is requesting will be invested in the purchase of seeds, wire, poles, fertilizers, and defoliants. He is grateful for the financial support so that he can develop his farm.

loan.use: Purchase farming supplies

loan.name: Madres Activas Group

texts.en:
This committee was formed on September 16th, 2008, on the initiative of Ms. Carolina Velazco (a former member). The group was formed thanks to the overwhelming desire of its members.
The members of this group are investing the loan they receive into buying fruits, vegetables, clothing, soft drinks, articles of jewelry, bread and meat to resell in their businesses. All of the members of the committee say they are happy with the given credit because they will be able to improve their lives.
Mrs. Delcida is the chairwoman of this committee. She has a small general store which sells everything. But it costs a lot of money to stock the store to supply the needs of her customers, so she applied for a loan because believes that with this investment she can progress.

loan.use: To purchase products to resell

loan.name: Noemy Esperanza

texts.es: La seora Noemy Esperanza Z. tiene 53 aos de edad, vive en la colonia Morazan. Tiene casa propia y se dedica a la venta de golosinas, desayunos, almuerzos y cenas. su negocio esta ubicado en su casa de habitacion. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de alimentos para la preparacion de sus sabrosas comidas y tambien necesita comprar platos, vasos y mesas plasticas para reemplazar algunas que ya estan quebradas. gracias a su negocio a logrado darles los estudios a sus hijas y su mayor deseo es tener a sus dos hijas graduadas de la universidad, nos comento que una vez que logre su meta con sus hijas podra invertir mas en su negocio y hacerlo mas grande y mas bonito para dar un mejor servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
53-year old Seora Noemy Esperanza Z. lives in the Morazan neighbourhood. She owns a house and earns her living by selling candy, breakfasts, lunches, and dinners from her home. She is seeking a loan to buy ingredients for her delicious food, and she also needs to buy plates, glasses, and plastic tables to replace her old broken ones.
With the income from her business she has managed to educate her daughters, and her greatest wish is to see them graduate from university. Noemy explains that once this goal has been achieved, she will be able to invest more money in her business. Her plan is to expand and renovate it, and thus provide her customers with better service.

loan.use: to buy food ingredients, dishes etc.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy pigs and pay workers to help at harvest time

loan.name: Petrona De Los Angeles

texts.es: Petrona De Los ngeles tiene 57 aos, ella tiene mucho tiempo de trabajar con Fundacin Len 2000 por lo que su record crediticio es muy bueno. Es una mujer viuda. La actividad econmica de Petrona es brindar el servicio de molino. Hace ms de 15 aos que se dedica a esta actividad econmica. Los problemas que ha enfrentado Petrona son de salud ya que debido a su edad es muy difcil tener la agilidad para servir a sus clientes, pero esto no le impide el seguir adelante. Siempre se ha caracterizado por tener un gran carisma con sus clientes. El financiamiento es destinado para capital de trabajo para proporcionarle mantenimiento a su molino. Su deseo es mejorar su salud para continuar con el negocio.
texts.en:
Petrona De Los ngeles, 57, has been collaborating with Fundacin Len 2000 for a long time so her credit history is very good. She is a widow and her economic activity is providing milling services.
Shes been in this line of work for over 15 years. The problems Petrona has faced are health related because due to her age its more difficult to have the agility needed to serve her customers but this doesnt impede her continuing forward. She has always been characterized with great charisma towards her customers.
She will use this loan as working capital to provide maintenance to her mill. Her wish is that her health improves so that she can continue in business.

loan.use: For mill maintenance.

loan.name: Deysi

texts.es:
La seora Deisy A. tiene 58 aos de edad, esta casada con el seor Ezequiel Ordoez y no tienen hijos que dependan de ellos. Deysi vive con su esposo y se dedica a la venta productos varios como ser: harina, huevos, papas, platanos, manteca, aceite, leche, azucar, carne de res, cerdo y pollos. tambien tiene un puesto de venta de golosinas en el mercado viejo, emplea a dos personas que le ayudan con la fabricacion de las comidas y la atencion a los clientes, en el negocio de comidas vende tacos, enchiladas, baleadas, tortillas con quesillo, platanos fritos con frijoles, arroz con Pollo, jugos naturales, y refrescos de botella.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de abarroteria para surtir su negocio. Su meta a corto plazo es montar un nuevo negocio para tener mas utilidades.
texts.en:
Mrs. Deisy A., 58, is married to Mr. Ezequiel Ordoez; they have no dependent children.
Deisy lives with her husband and sells various products like: flour, eggs, potatoes, bananas, lard, oil, milk, sugar, beef, pork and chickens.
She also has a stand in the old market selling sweets. She hires two people who help her prepare meals and tend to customers. In the food business she sells tacos, enchiladas, baleadas (tortilla stuffed with beans), tortillas with cheese, fried bananas with beans, chicken and rice, natural fruit juices and bottled soft drinks.
She will use the loan to buy groceries to stock her store. Her short term goal is to set up a new business to have more profits.

loan.use: To buy stock items for the store.

loan.name: Veronica Elizabeth

texts.es: Vernica, reside en Corinto departamento de Morazn, tiene 27 aos de edad, su familia est conformada por su esposo Jos Israel y sus cuatro hijos: Kevin de 9 aos, Merari de 6 aos, Josu Ariel de 4 aos y Jos de 1 ao de edad, todos son dependientes. Vernica y su esposo se dedican a la venta de frutas y verduras desde hace 2 aos, esta idea nace por la necesidad de trabajar y tener dinero para cubrir los gastos de sus hijos. Ella est solicitando un prstamo para comprar frutas y verduras, las cuales adquiere en el mercado de San Miguel, con los fondos del prstamo quiere surtir y mejorar el negocio, los nicos riesgos es los cambios de precio que existen a diario en la mercadera. Las aspiraciones de ella es trabajar diariamente por mejorar la atencin y el servicio a los clientes, tambin velar por su hogar y las necesidades, apoyando a sus hijos en el estudio.
texts.en:
Vernica lives in Corinto, Morazn department. She is 27 years old and her family is made up of her husband, Jos Israel, and their four dependent children: Kevin, 9, Merari, 6, Josu Daniel, 4 and Jos, 1. Vernica and her husband have been selling fruit and vegetables for the last two years. This idea arose out of the need to work and have income to cover their childrens expenses.
She is asking for a loan to buy fruit and vegetables that she gets in San Miguels market. She wants to use the funds from the loan to stock and improve the business. The only risks are the daily price fluctuations of the merchandise.
Her dream is to work daily to improve customer service and to watch over her home and needs supporting her childrens schooling.

loan.use: To buy fruit and vegetables.

loan.name: Felix Armando

texts.es: Felix es un pequeo comerciante dedicado a las ventas de muebles y electrodomstico, vendiendo al contado y al crdito, iniciando hace diez aos, con una variedad de productos, en la venta de madera, alquiler de tierra y ahora vendiendo electrodomsticos. Es atreves de Afodenic que comienza a invertir en ms productos al otorgarle un financiamiento el cual logra aumentar sus ventas. En inventario no tiene productos ya que entrego todos sus pedidos ahora, con este nuevo prstamo comprara cuatro camas de madera matrimonial, dos muebles de madera para tv. Logrando vender a buen precio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Felix is a small businessman who sells furniture and household appliances for cash and on credit. He started this business ten years ago with a variety of products. Felix sold wood and rented out land, but now he sells appliances.

He hopes to receive a loan from AFODENIC so that he can invest in more products to increase his sales. Felix has no products in his inventory since they were all sold to fulfill orders. With this new loan, he will buy four wooden double beds and two wooden TV stands. This will enable him to sell to his customers at a good price.

loan.use: Purchase wood furniture to sell

loan.name: Lupita I Group

texts.es: Esta foto fue tomada en casa D. L. seora Mara Luisa H., un integrante del grupo Lupita 1, que esta ubicado en el Estado D. VeraC., en Mxico, L. seora Maria Luisa H es integrante del grupo. ElL. se dedica a L. venta D. ropa, mochilas y zapatos, que inicio hace 2 aos. Solicita el prstamo para invertir en mercancia para su negocio D. ropa. Los clientes L. conocen como una persona responsable y trabajadora. Al momento D. solicitar este prstamo se siente muy satisfecha ya que por medio D. este prstamo podr incrementar sus ventas y tener ms clientes. ElL. tiene 34 aos, estudi hasta el nivel medio superior, vive en unin libre y tiene un hijo varon. Tambin espera ser L. mejor D. L. zona en ventas. Quiere ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad D. vida y seguir apoyando a su hijo con sus estudios hasta llegar a darle una profesin. Braulia Z., es L. presidenta del grupo. Tiene 34 aos, estudi hasta L. preparatoria, vive en unin libre y tiene en total 2 hijos; una nia y un nio, elL. se dedica a L. venta D. antojitos que inicio hace 1 ao. Solicita el prstamo para comprara mas insumos para su negocio y D. esta manera tener ms variedad y as mismo obtener ms clientes.
texts.en:
This photo was taken in the house of Mara Luisa H., a member of the group Lupita 1, located in the state of VeraC., Mxico. Mara Luisa sells clothing, backpacks, and shoes, a business activity she began two years ago. She is requesting a loan to invest in merchandise for her clothing business. Her customers know her as a responsible and hardworking person. She is pleased to use this loan opportunity to increase her sales and customers and hopes to be the best salesperson in the area. She is 34 years old and attended school through her pre-college studies. She and her partner have a son together. Mara Luisa wants to offer her family a better quality of life and to be able to support her son's schooling until he is able to have a professional career.
Braulia Z. is the group's president. She is 34 years old, has a high school education and has two children, one girl and one boy, with her partner. She sells snack food, a business she started a year ago. She is requesting a loan to buy supplies for her business to be able to offer more variety and thus attract more customers.

loan.use: Purchase of clothing

loan.name: Ada Ruth

texts.es:
La seora Ada Ruth H. tiene 46 aos de edad, vive en el barrio el Mangallano de la ciudad de San Lorenzo y se dedica a la venta de refrescos en diferentes tamaos. Ada es madre de cuatro hijos y esta casada con el seor Marco Antonio Rodas. tiene 15 aos de vivir en dicho lugar y dos de sus hijos ya se graduaron y los otros dos continuan estudiando. su esposo le ayuda a cubrir los gastos del hogar. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de refrescos al por mayor ya que en esta epoca se vende mucho el refresco helado debido al gran calor que se mantiene en la zona.
Ada es una mujer tranquila, responsable y con deseos de salir adelante. en un futuro desea remodelar su negocio y comprar mas freezers o refrigeradoras para tener mas ganancias.
texts.en:
Ms. Ada Ruth H. is 46 years old. She lives in the Mangallano neighborhood in the city of San Lorenzo. She works selling soda of various sizes. Ada is a mother to 4 children and is married to Mr. Marco Antonio Rodas. She has lived in the same place for 15 years and two of their children have already graduated and the other two are continuing their studies.
Her husband helps cover the home expenses. She will use the loan to buy wholesale soft drinks since at this time much soda is sold frozen because of the great heat that remains in the area.
Ada is a very laid back woman who is responsible and wants to succeed. In the future she wants to remodel her business and buy more freezers or refrigerators to earn a greater income.

loan.use: To buy wholesale soft drinks of different sizes: 1/2, 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5 and 3 liters

loan.name: Felix Manuel

texts.es: Flix Manuel tiene 1 hijo que asiste a un colegio pblico, ya que no tiene los suficientes ingresos para mantenerlos en un privado. Su actividad econmica es brindar el servicio de pintura y soldadura, que est ubicada de manera ambulante. Inicio este medio de vida por su Padre quien le enseo este negocio, para que el pudiera mantenerse. Ahora est solicitando un financiamiento que ser utilizado para la compra de materiales. Flix tiene el sueo de incrementar su negocio para que el da de maana esto le asegure el futuro a su hijo.
texts.en: Flix Manuel has one son who is in public school. He does not earn enough of an income to send him to private school. He works as a street vendor and provides a paint and welding service. He started doing this through his father who taught him the business so that he could support himself. Now he is requesting a loan that he will use to purchase materials. Flix has a dream to expand his business so that one day he can assure his child's future.

loan.use: Working capital
